tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE water_consumption_data (
    municipality_id INT NOT NULL,
    consumption_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    residential_consumers INT NOT NULL,
    commercial_consumers INT NOT NULL,
    industrial_consumers INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE water_consumption_data ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  municipality_id INT, 
 consumption_volume DECIMAL(10,2), 
 consumption_date DATE, 
 FOREIGN KEY (municipality_id) REFERENCES municipalities(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE water_meter (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_number INT,
    installation_date DATE,
    municipality_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (municipality_id) REFERENCES municipality(id)
);

CREATE TABLE water_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meter_id INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_gallons INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES water_meter(id)
);
